note: Dont forget to prepare ppt for oral exam. Format requirements: Time of presentation – from 5 to 10 minutes;  Number of slides – appr. 5-8 contents slides (without the title slide and the slide with references); depending on the time you're going to speak.  Obligatory slides: 1) Title/Introduction slide (with the title of the presentation and your name in it) 2) Agenda (contents/overview) 3) Summary 4) Sources.
